sentences.en: Allocation of booth location will at the discretion of the Organiser.
sentences.cn: 主办机构有权分配展位位置.

sentences.en: Electronic Punching and Timing System will be used and E - card shall be provided by the Organiser.
sentences.cn: 大会将采用香港野外定向总会之电子打孔及计时系统,而电子控制咭则由大会提供.

sentences.en: Participants shall abide by regulations of the venue and announcements of the Organiser.
sentences.cn: 参赛者必须遵守场地的各项规则及大会的各项宣布.

sentences.en: Participants should comply with rules and regulations of the sports ground and announcements of the Organiser.
sentences.cn: 参赛者必须遵守运动场馆的各项规则及大会各项宣布.

sentences.en: Participants should not along valuables with them . No by the Organiser for loss.
sentences.cn: 参赛者携来物品,请自行保管,参赛者请勿携带贵重物品,如有遗失,大会概不负责.

sentences.en: Please complete the below and return it to the Organiser by FAX.
sentences.cn: 请填上您的资料,按需求填写[技术讲座]入场票的数量,传真交回主办单位办理.

sentences.en: She was by reputation a good organiser.
sentences.cn: 听说她的组织能力很强。

sentences.en: Shuttlecocks provided by the Organiser shall be used in all matches.
sentences.cn: 所有赛事须采用大会供应的羽毛球作赛.

sentences.en: Size 5 footballs which provided by the Organiser should be all matches.
sentences.cn: 球员必须穿著合规格的号码球衣,球靴、球袜及护胫作赛.

sentences.en: Table - tennis ( orange in colour, diameter 40 mm ) provided by the Organiser should be used in all matches.
sentences.cn: 所有赛事须采用大会供应之乒乓球作赛 ( 橙色 、 直径40毫米 ).

sentences.en: The organiser held a round - up session at HKBU last week.
sentences.cn: 主办单位于上周在浸会大学举行 总结会,让团员分享见闻和感受.

sentences.en: The organiser reserves the right to alter this programme as may be necessary.
sentences.cn: 会议组织者在必要时有权对此议程作出适当调整.

sentences.en: The organiser will not be responsible for any loss of personal belongings.
sentences.cn: 如有个人财物遗失,大会概不负责.

sentences.en: We accept that the Organiser bears no responsibility for any error or omission.
sentences.cn: 本公司同意,上述资料如有错漏,主办机构毋须负责.

words.tran_cn: 组织者；发起人；形成体（等于organizer）

trans.tran_cn: 组织者；发起人；形成体（等于organizer）
[经] 组织者，创立人，发起人
